Source.Name: libTAS
Source.Description: libTAS is a Linux-only toolset for creating tool-assisted speedruns. It mostly supports SDL, but is being actively developed to support other engines as well. It's already been used for some GDQ runs, including the Mari0 speedrun at AGDQ2019.
